name: Bertrand Arthur William Russell, 3rd Earl Russell
main_interests: Metaphysics, epistemology, logic, mathematics, philosophy of language, philosophy of science, ethics, philosophy of religion, history of philosophy
influences: Mill, Peano, Frege, Santayana, Leibniz, Hume, Locke, Wittgenstein, Spinoza, Whitehead
notable_ideas: Logical atomism, theory of descriptions, knowledge by acquaintance and knowledge by description, Russell's paradox, Russell's teapot.
